attributes.action: Re-introduce cookery lessons into the school curriculum for boys and girls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of giving money to obese people the issue that needs tackling is that young people don't know anything about the food they eat these days or how to cook it. Education is part of the answer. Halting the manufacture of more junk foods and foods with added vitamins which should not be needed would help too.
